import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductScreen (props) { console.log(props.match.params.id); const product = data.products.find(x => x.id === props.match.params.id); console.log(product); return
Back to results

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews } Reviews)
  • ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:
} export default ProductScreen;
